DOC.brief_summary: This study test hypothesis optimize savory cluster ( Test-cluster ) make proprietary baking process combine slow digestible carbohydrate fiber elicit low postprandial blood glucose insulin response Control-cluster make general processing procedure typical ingredient commonly use commercially available snack bar : oat , peanut , corn syrup . However , since Test-cluster contains ~30 % less available-carbohydrate ( 24g ) Control ( 33g ) , postprandial response elicit Test-cluster also compare portion White-bread match available-carbohydrate content . On 3 separate day , 25 healthy male non-pregnant female age 18-60 yr BMI 20 35 kg/m² fast serum glucose < 7.0mmol/L ( 126 mg/dL ) ask consume 1 serving ( 56g ) Test- Control-cluster 47g White Bread blood glucose insulin measure interval next 4 hr . Each serve Test-cluster Control-cluster contain similar amount total carbohydrate , protein , fat energy content . Each serve Test-cluster White-bread equivalent amount 24g available carbohydrate . On test occasion , subject weigh , 2 fast blood sample obtain finger-prick 5min apart 2nd sample , subject start consume test meal . Subjects ask consume entire test meal within 10 min . At first bite timer start blood sample take glucose analysis 10 , 20 , 30 , 40 , 50 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 180 240 min start eat . Additional blood take separate vial -5 , 0 , 20 , 40 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 180 240 min insulin analysis . Blood sample obtain hand warm electric heating pad 3-5 min prior sample . During 4hr test , participant remain seat quietly . After last blood sample participant offer snack allow leave .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Optimized Savory Cluster Glycemic Insulinemic Responses Healthy Individuals
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female , 1860 year age , inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20.0 < 35 kg/m² screening ( visit 1 ) . Willing maintain habitual diet , physical activity pattern , body weight throughout trial refrain smoking 12hr prior visit . Willing maintain current dietary supplement use throughout trial . On test day , subject agrees take dietary supplement dismissal GI lab . Failure comply result reschedule test visit . Normal fast serum glucose ( < 7.0mmol/L capillary correspond whole blood glucose < 6.3mmol/L ) . Willing abstain alcohol consumption avoid vigorous physical activity 24 h prior test visit . Absence health condition would prevent fulfillment study requirement judge Investigator basis medical history . Understanding study procedure willing provide inform consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study investigator .
